Subject.DN: C:US, CN:Android, L:Mountain View, O:Google Inc., ST:California, OU:Android

Issuer.DN: C:US, CN:Android, L:Mountain View, O:Google Inc., ST:California, OU:Android

android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION.short_description: access precise location only in the foreground
android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION.full_description: This app can get your precise location from location services while the app is in use. Location services for your device must be turned on for the app to get location. This may increase battery usage.

android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.short_description: read the contents of your shared storage
android.permission.READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE.full_description: Allows the app to read the contents of your shared storage.

android.permission.READ_CONTACTS.full_description:
Allows the app to read data about your contacts stored on your phone.
      Apps will also have access to the accounts on your phone that have created contacts.
      This may include accounts created by apps you have installed.
      This permission allows apps to save your contact data, and malicious apps may share contact data without your knowledge.

android.permission.CAMERA.full_description: This app can take pictures and record videos using the camera while the app is in use.

android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATIO.short_description: access approximate location only in the foreground
android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATIO.full_description: This app can get your approximate location from location services while the app is in use. Location services for your device must be turned on for the app to get location.

android.permission.WAKE_LOCK.full_description: Allows the app to prevent the phone from going to sleep.

android.permission.BLUETOOTH.full_description:
Allows the app to view the
      configuration of the Bluetooth on the phone, and to make and accept
      connections with paired devices.

android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE.full_description:
Allows the app to view information
      about Wi-Fi networking, such as whether Wi-Fi is enabled and name of
      connected Wi-Fi devices.

android.permission.READ_PHONE_STATE.full_description:
Allows the app to access the phone
      features of the device.  This permission allows the app to determine the
      phone number and device IDs, whether a call is active, and the remote number
      connected by a call.

android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE.full_description:
Allows the app to view
      information about network connections such as which networks exist and are
      connected.

android.permission.MOUNT_UNMOUNT_FILESYS.full_description:
Allows the app to mount and
        unmount filesystems for removable storage.

android.permission.INTERNET.full_description:
Allows the app to create
     network sockets and use custom network protocols. The browser and other
     applications provide means to send data to the internet, so this
     permission is not required to send data to the internet.

android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.short_description: modify or delete the contents of your shared storage
android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAG.full_description: Allows the app to write the contents of your shared storage.

android.permission.GET_ACCOUNTS.full_description:
Allows the app to get
      the list of accounts known by the phone.  This may include any accounts
      created by applications you have installed.

android.permission.READ_SMS.short_description: read your text messages (SMS or MMS)
android.permission.READ_SMS.full_description: This app can read all SMS (text) messages stored on your phone.

threat_severity.level_description: Severity HIGH because it was considered trojan. Other contributing factor was that it could not be run in sandboxes.

attributes.magic: Zip archive data, at least v0.0 to extract, compression method=deflate

crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_msg: ET INFO Android Device Connectivity Check
crowdsourced_ids_results.rule_raw: alert http $HOME_NET any -> $EXTERNAL_NET any (msg:"ET INFO Android Device Connectivity Check"; flow:established,to_server; urilen:13; http.method; content:"GET"; http.uri; content:"/generate_204"; fast_pattern; endswith; http.host; content:"connectivitycheck.gstatic.com"; http.accept_enc; content:"gzip"; depth:4; endswith; http.header_names; content:!"Cache"; content:!"Referer"; classtype:misc-activity; sid:2036220; rev:4; metadata:affected_product Android, attack_target Mobile_Client, created_at 2018_09_14, deployment Perimeter, deployment Internal, former_category INFO, performance_impact Low, signature_severity Informational, tag Connectivity_Check, updated_at 2020_09_16;)
